rules.name: Extract Percentages
rules.description: This rule extracts percentage values, which can be formatted as numbers followed by a percentage sign, with or without spaces.

rules.name: Extract Currency Values
rules.description: This rule extracts monetary values, which can include currency indicators like EUR and numbers formatted with commas and periods.

rules.name: Extract Mixed Percentages and Values
rules.description: This rule extracts values that combine both percentages and additional indicators like 'n.z.' that may indicate non-zero values.

rules.name: Capture Numeric Ranges with Percentage
rules.description: This rule addresses the extraction of numeric ranges formatted with percentage, indicating variation between minimum and maximum values.

rules.name: Handle Currency Variants
rules.description: This rule will extract currencies structured as 'X.XXX.XXX,YY' or similar formats, keeping the currency label consistent.

rules.name: Identify Undefined Percentages
rules.description: This rule captures placeholders for percentages that appear as blanks or special characters like underscores.

rules.name: Extract Comma-Separated Values
rules.description: This rule extracts values that are written in lists or sequences with commas, including a percentage sign if present.

rules.name: Include Percent Sign Following Numeric Ranges
rules.description: Extracts values that are percentages immediately following any numeric ranges.

rules.name: Extract Currency with Percentage
rules.description: This captures values formatted with currencies followed by a percentage potentially indicating a tax rate.

rules.name: General Monetary Value Capture
rules.description: A catch-all rule to collect any potential monetary value strings not captured by tighter rules.
